user.title: Auckland Rubbish Collection Setup
user.description: Get your Address ID from the [Auckland Council Find Your Collection Day]({url}) search page. The Address ID is the 11 digits after the 'an=' part of the results page url. See the Help for more information if needed.

data.address_id: Address Number from the Find Your Collection Day url

data_description.address_name: A name to identify this address (e.g. Home)
data_description.address_id: The 11-digit number from the collection day url (e.g. 12345678901)

error.invalid_id_length: Address ID must be exactly 11 characters long
error.invalid_id_format: Address ID must contain only digits (0-9)
